PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: This privacy policy describes how Bistro Saimaa processes personal data collected through our contact form.
PrivacyPage.section1Intro: We collect the following information through the contact form:
PrivacyPage.section2Text: Collected data is used solely for customer communication, such as responding to inquiries, processing reservation requests, and organizing messages more clearly in email.
PrivacyPage.section3Item1: Is processed only by Bistro Saimaa staff
PrivacyPage.section3Item2: Is stored in our register (email) indefinitely unless deletion is requested
PrivacyPage.section3Item3: Is not shared with third parties for marketing or other purposes
PrivacyPage.section3Item4: Is not transferred outside the EU/EEA area
PrivacyPage.section3Item5: Message transmission is handled through Web3Forms service (web3forms.com)
PrivacyPage.section4Text: We use only one cookie for storing language preference:
PrivacyPage.section4Item2: Purpose: Stores the user's selected language (Finnish/English)
PrivacyPage.section4Item4: Does not contain personal data and does not track users
PrivacyPage.section5Intro: We use Vercel Analytics to collect anonymous usage data about our website:
PrivacyPage.section5Item1: We collect anonymous data about visitor numbers and popular pages
PrivacyPage.section5Item2: Data is used to improve website usability and performance
PrivacyPage.section5Item3: We do not combine analytics data with personal information
PrivacyPage.section5Item4: Vercel Analytics does not use cookies and does not collect identifying user data
PrivacyPage.section5Item5: You can read more about Vercel Analytics privacy at:
PrivacyPage.section6Item1: Review what data we have collected about you, i.e., messages you have sent through the form
PrivacyPage.section6Item2: Request deletion of your data from our email
PrivacyPage.section6Text: You can exercise these rights by contacting us via email at bistrosaimaa@gmail.com.
